tool_description: The CPL API when requested with the flipkart URL of the corresponding product, would fetch details like Cost of the Product, Warranty of the Product, Rating of the Product, Monthly Cost per Lifetime, Value for Money Aspects of the Product and stores it cloud for later retrieval.
name: Flipkart Cost Per Lifetime
title: Flipkart Cost Per Lifetime

api_list.name: Result
api_list.description: A flipkart product URL to find CPL of a product
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flipkart-cost-per-lifetime.p.rapidapi.com/result"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flipkart-cost-per-lifetime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://flipkart-cost-per-lifetime.p.rapidapi.com/result"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flipkart-cost-per-lifetime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
